testcase.name: Rest API testing
testcase.system-out: Given url "https://www.w3schools.com/xml/tempconvert.asmx/CelsiusToFahrenheit" . passed And header Content-Type = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" ............. passed And request "Celsius=40" .................................................. passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response contains "104" ......................................... passed And match response //string contains "104" ................................ passed And match responseHeaders['Server'] == ['Microsoft-IIS/7.5'] .............. passed And match responseHeaders['Server'][0] == 'Microsoft-IIS/7.5' ............. passed And match responseType == "xml" ........................................... passed And assert responseTime <= 2000 ........................................... passed
